Predicting your Medical Insurance

Predict the cost for your Medical Insurance!







{{pred}}




>
Company Bio

Motivated by the curiosity to understand how insurance amounts are determined, a dataset was explored to predict insurance amounts based on various features. The categorical values were converted to numerical, and a heatmap and data visualization plots were created to analyze dependencies. Skewness and kurtosis were examined, followed by predictions using linear regression, SVR, ridge regressor, and random forest regressor. Hyperparameter tuning was performed for the models, and a graph was plotted to compare their performance. The model achieved an 86% accuracy for medical insurance amount prediction. The final model was deployed using Flask, enabling users to interact with it.
